price: Basi ama atakaye pewa kitabu chake kwa mkono wake wa kulia, atasema: Haya someni kitabu changu!
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
footnotes: Ama mwenye kupewa kitabu chake kwa mkono wake wa kulia, atasema akiwatangazia furaha yake walio karibu naye: Chukueni msome kitabu changu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu biyamīnihi fayaqūlu hāumu iq'raū kitābiyah
